div.p: I'm a senior in Pharmaceutical Marketing.
My career ambitions are to combine my love of health care -
I have a degree in Respiratory Therapy and I stayed home to raise the family for 15 years.
And I didn't want get back into that clinical health care.
So I wanted something fresh and new.
I combined the love of health care with my interest in Marketing,
And I saw this-it was brand new.
I was just reading the paper one day and I saw a brand new major,
and it just screamed out my name.
And I said, "This is for me."
And so I jumped in and I've just loved every minute of it.
